name: ITCO
description: Tiered IBCO (ITCO). this implementation has a known flaw, the price of tokens does not change if tier increases during a single purhcase, the buyer receives all tokens for the previous tier price. Licensed to everyone.

functionDecorators.name: collect
functionDecorators.description: withdraw the ETH emassed in the ibco.

functionDecorators.name: currentTier
functionDecorators.description: returns the current tier and current price. helper function. first variable returned is tier, second is price.

functionDecorators.name: open
functionDecorators.description: start the ibco. owner must approve IBCO contract before start will succeed.

parameterDecorators.name: a
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of token to include in ibco.

parameterDecorators.name: t
parameterDecorators.description: the total length of the ibco (seconnds after start).

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner_
parameterDecorators.description: the new address to assume ownership responsiblity (the multisig).
